intro: Psychotria inegi, commonly known as the red-eyed psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers with prominent yellow stamens, which make it visually distinctive. It typically grows as an epiphyte or terrestrial plant in humid, shaded environments. Psychotria inegi is also noted for its chemical composition, which includes various alkaloids.
